719416f-a.text:
East Broadway, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Forsyth Street.
June 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719416f-a.folder: East Broadway & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY

719755f-a.text:
Forsyth Street, west side, north from East Broadway, to and including Division Street. Buildings shown, are under the roadway of the Manhattan Bridge. Elevated on Divisoon Street, is the Second Ave. Line.
June 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
719755f-a.folder: Forsyth Street & East Broadway, Manhattan, NY

719417f-a.text:
98-100 East Broadway, east of Forsyth Street.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
719417f-a.folder: East Broadway & Forsyth Street, Manhattan, NY

719754f-b.text:
Forsyth Street, west from and including East Broadway. Note portion of the Manhattan Bridge Approach on the left. Elevated shown, is
the Second Ave. Line, and is on Division Street.
October 28, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
The same, slightly closer.
June 6, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
The same, at a later date.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
719754f-b.folder: Forsyth Street & East Broadway, Manhattan, NY
